Name: Issue 344
Summary: All About SVGs and Apps built with MAUI!
Introduction: G'day everyone, welcome to issue #344 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around  Xamarin and MAUI communities this week. Some great design articles this week as well as more articles about apps built with MAUI. The future is looking bright. Have a great week everyone ♥️ Kym

Articles.Title: SVG Generators
Articles.Description: A complete guide to SVG generators: everything from SVG shapes and cropping tools to SVG filters, color matrix mixers and SVG to JSX generators. Given how easy it is to work with SVGs in MAUI this could be a useful resource.
Articles.Author: Iris Lješnjanin

Articles.Title: Multi-Language Apps with .NET MAUI Blazor Localization
Articles.Description: Localization is a great way to let your app reach a broader audience and be more inclusive! In this video we will learn how to add localization to your .NET MAUI Blazor app with Microsoft.Extensions.Localization. With the help of the IStringLocalizer and resx files we will see how to add translations for different languages to our app in minutes!
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis
